statements: SELECT * FROM PestInfestations WHERE pest_id = 1;
SELECT pest_name, crop_affected FROM PestInfestations WHERE infestation_level > 3;
SELECT pest_id, crop_affected, infestation_date FROM PestInfestations WHERE pest_name = 'Aphids';
SELECT * FROM PestInfestations ORDER BY infestation_level DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_infestations FROM PestInfestations WHERE infestation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM PestInfestations WHERE infestation_level > 5 ORDER BY infestation_date DESC
SELECT pest_name, crop_affected FROM PestInfestations WHERE crop_affected LIKE '%corn%'
SELECT pest_name, infestation_level FROM PestInfestations WHERE pest_name='Aphids'
SELECT DISTINCT crop_affected FROM PestInfestations ORDER BY crop_affected ASC
SELECT AVG(infestation_level) AS average_infestation_level FROM PestInfestations
SELECT * FROM Pests;
SELECT p_name, p_type FROM Pests WHERE infestation_level > 3;
SELECT p_name, p_type FROM Pests ORDER BY p_type DESC;
SELECT c_name, c_type FROM Crops WHERE affected_by_p_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT c_id, c_name FROM Crops WHERE c_type = 'Vegetable';
SELECT * FROM Pests WHERE p_type = 'Insect';
SELECT p_name, p_type FROM Pests WHERE infestation_level > 5 ORDER BY p_name DESC;
SELECT c_name, p_name FROM Crops INNER JOIN Pests ON Crops.affected_by_p_id = Pests.p_id WHERE p_type = 'Weed' ORDER BY c_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Pests WHERE infestation_level BETWEEN 2 AND 7;
SELECT c_name, COUNT(*) AS total_infested FROM Crops INNER JOIN Pests ON Crops.affected_by_p_id = Pests.p_id GROUP BY c_name HAVING total_infested > 3 ORDER BY total_infested DESC;
SELECT * FROM Farmer;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM Crop WHERE crop_type = 'Cereals';
SELECT farmer_name, contact_number FROM Farmer WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT pest_name, infestation_date, impact_on_crops FROM PestInfestation ORDER BY infestation_date DESC;
SELECT count(*) AS total_infestations FROM PestInfestation;
SELECT pest_name, infestation_date FROM PestInfestation;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, planting_date, harvest_date FROM Crop ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT farmer_name, contact_number, address FROM Farmer WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Crop WHERE harvest_date > '2022-01-01' AND crop_type = 'Fruit' ORDER BY harvest_date DESC;
SELECT pest_name, impact_on_crops, infestation_date FROM PestInfestation WHERE impact_on_crops LIKE '%severe%' ORDER BY infestation_date;
SELECT * FROM PestInfestations;
SELECT pest_name, infestation_date FROM PestInfestations WHERE pest_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM Crops WHERE crop_plant_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM InfestationImpact ORDER BY pest_id DESC, impact_id ASC;
SELECT farmer_name, contact_number FROM Farmers WHERE farmer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM PestInfestations LIMIT 5;
SELECT pest_name, infestation_date FROM PestInfestations ORDER BY infestation_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, crop_plant_date, crop_harvest_date FROM Crops WHERE crop_type='Vegetables';
SELECT i.impact_id, p.pest_name, c.crop_name, ii.impact_description FROM InfestationImpact ii JOIN PestInfestations p ON ii.pest_id = p.pest_id JOIN Crops c ON ii.crop_id = c.crop_id;
SELECT f.farmer_name, f.contact_number, c.crop_name FROM Farmers f JOIN Crops c ON f.farmer_id = c.crop_id;
SELECT * FROM Crop;
SELECT pest_name, infestation_date, crop_affected FROM PestInfestation WHERE infestation_severity > 5;
SELECT crop_name FROM Crop WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit';
SELECT control_method, use_date FROM PestControl ORDER BY use_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM InfestationLocation WHERE latitude < 0 OR longitude > 0;
SELECT * FROM PestInfestation WHERE infestation_severity > 3;
SELECT pest_name, infestation_date FROM PestInfestation WHERE crop_affected = 'Tomatoes';
SELECT Crop.crop_name, InfestationImpact.impact_description FROM Crop JOIN InfestationImpact ON Crop.id = InfestationImpact.crop_id;

SELECT PestControl.control_method, PestInfestation.infestation_date, InfestationLocation.location_name FROM PestControl JOIN PestInfestation ON PestControl.infestation_id = PestInfestation.id JOIN InfestationLocation ON PestInfestation.id = InfestationLocation.infestation_id;

SELECT Crop.crop_name, COUNT(InfestationImpact.id) AS total_impacts FROM Crop LEFT JOIN InfestationImpact ON Crop.id = InfestationImpact.crop_id GROUP BY Crop.crop_name HAVING COUNT(InfestationImpact.id) > 0;
